website_summaries.verdict: This slender, classic copper cuff bracelet hides 6 small magnets near the wrist to help ease pain.
pros: Open designs lets you adjust size easily
Some notice pain reduction while wearing
cons: Magnets may discolor and leave marks on wrist over time

customer_reviews.title: Mysterious effective for my tendinitis
customer_reviews.text: How does this work, I don't know. I was skeptical, but like copper and rose gold so I figured it wouldn't hurt anything. I actually get compliments on the way it looks and I feel crazy when I explain to people why am wearing it, but Mousing on the computer gets my tendinitis acting up after a few day at work usually but hasn't bothered me since I've been wearing this. I am A medical prof. And wash my hands several times an hour with harsh soap, and have not had this turn green. I am going on about 7 weeks of 24/7 wear. I don't know what to say! It works for me, the skeptic...
customer_reviews.author: Richele

customer_reviews.title: Second bracelet is very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I love my first bracelet which is pictured on left, so I ordered a second one which is totally different -rough square ends, lightweight , polished cooper finish has bumps. Very disappointed. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Cefalu

customer_reviews.title: What do you have to lose!
customer_reviews.text: It alleviates any kind of pain so dramatically. Initially, wearing it for the first time, you will start to really notice the pain decrease in about a week or two. If I have mine off for a couple of days the pain immediately comes right back until I put it back on. I literally have not had to have hand surgery because of these copper bracelets. The good Lord thought of everything!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer service

customer_reviews.title: I have carpel tunnel in my right hand which is very painful and swells but wearing the bracelet has made the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing my copper bracelet for about 2 months now and I can feel a difference. I have carpel tunnel in my right hand which is very painful and swells but wearing the bracelet has made the pain almost disappear. Did not turn green in the shower either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Solid Copper - Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this bracelet has not held up well at all. Was under impression that it was solid copper since it said it is pure copper, but apparently it is only copper plated. My husband received it for christmas and after wearing it for only a week the copper has worn off on the inside where it runs against his skin. Not sure if it has really helped any with his pain either.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother who has rheumatoid arthritis so bad her wrists and hands are extremely disformed. I molded the bracelet to one of her wrists but then it would slide down, as I didn't want to do it too tight. Then came back to check and she had moved down and she said it feels "much better." She said she can move her wrist around some without pain, which she hasn't been able to do in quite a while. I am so excited! We had gone to the store to try to find copper gloves, but those wouldn't come close to fitting around her hand/wrist. SOO, glad I found this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So stylish and additional benefits!
customer_reviews.text: This bracelet is so fresh. Got so many compliments on it. Bought this one and the men's copper bracelet. Customer service is great, got the bracelets real quick. I honestly do notice less pain where I used to get pain but I would have to wait a few weeks or take it off for a week and see what happens haha. I work a strenuous job and ride my bike a lot so I get a lot of strains usually. Bought it for pain... also bought it for my skin as I heard copper helps people with autoimmune skin diseases which i'm excited to find out about. Overall nice product and price is great. 😎😀
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Poe

customer_reviews.title: this package arrived empty
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday present for my husband. When we opened it the little velvet bag was there but no bracelet t his was so disappointing. I am not sure anything can be done as I have no proof .
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Buckwalter

customer_reviews.title: Greatly reduced my wrist pain.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I have arthritis, but every morning when I reached for my mouse at work, my wrist would start to ache. Next, I would reach for my wrist brace that had people constantly asking what I had done to my wrist. Not anymore! I can't say if it's mind over matter or actually helping alleviate the pain, but the once uncomfortable pain is gone since wearing this bracelet. Even better, I can wear it at home to do work in the yard and, unlike the brace, I don't need to worry about it getting dirty and I have much more flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Since he's had such great relief he tells everyone he knows about it
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been a diesel mechanic for over 30 years. He has developed arthritis in his hands, causing pain, swelling, sleepless nights, & limited strenth & movement of his hands. After purchasing the copper bracelet with magnets the swelling has gone away, pain eased, he can tighten hand into fist & he's able to sleep all night not waking up in pain. Since he's had such great relief he tells everyone he knows about it. We have purchased. One for his father who has the same symptoms from same occupation. Except without the magnets since his father has a difibulator. He too has found relief.
customer_reviews.author: Serena Henslee

customer_reviews.title: It teally works!
customer_reviews.text: I have had arthritis and pain in my wrists for years. Never believed a copper bracelet could work on the pain. Boy wad I wrong. This bracelet is fantastic. Have had no pain since I put it on. Miracle. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: PENGUIN6687

customer_reviews.title: Best Copper Bracelet For the Money
customer_reviews.text: Really like this bracelet. The copper is soft enough that it's easy to mold the bracelet to your arm. The edges are very smooth and don't rub. I have owned other copper bracelets, but this is by far the best one.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: It worms
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband but it was too small for him i started wearing it and my pain in my hands is better almost gone
customer_reviews.author: Jessi Daniel

customer_reviews.title: I don’t think this is copper
customer_reviews.text: Received bracelet in bad condition. Brand new and the coating was already peeling off. I don’t think this is real copper. Look for something else that’s 100% copper
customer_reviews.author: Maliah

customer_reviews.title: Magnets fell out
customer_reviews.text: The magnets fell out after a few weeks and after the 30 day return. They have a 60 day guarantee but no way to contact them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea E Malcom

customer_reviews.title: ... he said that it really helps and I am glad I don't like to see him in any kind ...
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my husband he has arthritis in his shoulder he said that it really helps and I am glad I don't like to see him in any kind of pain so if I think something might help relieve him of pain I am going to try it out. nothing bests a failure if you don't try.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible Quality. Magnets fell out after only three nights of wearing it to bed.
customer_reviews.author: John Balison1

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Magnets have fallen out. Very cheaply made would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Love this bracelet.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd copper bracelet I've ordered, and is the only one that hasn't tarnished my skin. I can definitely feel the difference when I do/don't have it on. I have been wearing this one for 2 months and feel a big change in my hands, especially in the morning when I wake up. That use to be the time my hands ached the most.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Someone suggested to me to purchase this bracelet because I ...
customer_reviews.text: Someone suggested to me to purchase this bracelet because I have carpal tunnel and I was sleeping in a hand brace. I have been wearing my bracelet for almost a week and the pain in my arm has greatly reduced and I haven't had to sleep in my hand brace. Before wearing the bracelet my fingers would go numb while keying at work and that hasn't happened since wearing this bracelet. So far the bracelet is working for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: My mother user for 3 months and don't work. The bracelet lost the color so fast. I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautful bracelet that works
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect the bracelet to actually work, so I was surprised to find my aches lessened or no longer present! The look is very nice. The weight is not heavy at all. It has not turned my skin green. I have purchased this bracelet several times over the past year. I can't keep them very long. I always end up giving them to a friend or family member that has arthritis or other pains. I will continue to order this bracelet from this seller. It is my favorite. I have paid full price for each of the bracelets.
customer_reviews.author: PuppyLove

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I have rheumatoid arthritis and on medication. I still get pain but wanted to try this. So far so good. Hoping it's going to continue with easing the pain
customer_reviews.author: Just me :)

customer_reviews.title: would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Husband's elbow began hurting after a few days of wearing the new bracelet- went back to the old copper bracelet and elbow quit hurting. would not recommend this product. My husband has worn copper bracelets for over 30 yrs and this has never happened.
customer_reviews.author: Jane W

customer_reviews.title: Cheap design
customer_reviews.text: All magnets came off in fist time used. Cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: Copper plating wore very quickly. Like just a few days. Did not help with pain. Looking now for solid copper bracelet. I guess i got what i paid for. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Serna

customer_reviews.title: Rip off. Very bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Very bad quality it started to change colour after one month. Total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Roberts

customer_reviews.title: We researched this product and believed that we had made a good choice when we purchased
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to take this opportunity to tell you that we would rate the Copper Bracelet with the highest rating possible 5+++!!!!! My husband experienced some unexpected arthritis in his hand. In the past several months he turned to topical ointments and anti inflammatory medication to control the pain. Since he started using your Copper Bracelet, he has used neither and his pain level has gone down considerably! We researched this product and believed that we had made a good choice when we purchased. We now KNOW that is was a good choice and we are thankful for the results! Thank you Coper Bracelet! We look forward to sharing this experience with family & friends!
customer_reviews.author: GracysMom

customer_reviews.title: Peeling
customer_reviews.text: the product has run out of ink. peeling. I was discouraged when using the product. does not cause the effect described. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Amaral

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Even though common sense told me not to waste my money, I went ahead and purchased this bracelet based on all the positive reviews. I've been wearing this for 1 week and it has done absolutely nothing for my arthritis. If there is some trick to making it work, like people claim it does, I'd like to know it. So my advice is to not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: littlefoot

customer_reviews.title: Fake Fake Fake
customer_reviews.text: This bracelet is fake and doesn't work. I have carpel tunnel and arthritis and I wore this for a month and it did absolutely nothing. I then bought a real pure copper bracelet and in 3 days I was pain free. Yes it tarnishes like its supposed to but it works. Don't waste your time and money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: BombChic

customer_reviews.title: Wish it worked
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in July, not sure how long your suppose to wear it but 21/2 months is not the magic number. Really wish my husband could find some relief,
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Gros

customer_reviews.title: Bracelet leaves black ring
customer_reviews.text: This bracelet seemed to alleviate the arthritic pain in my wrist, so I ordered a second as a gift for a friend with a similar ailment. In my second month of wearing it constantly in golf and tennis, it started to leave a black ring on my wrist. Now I need to scrub it almost every day with Brasso, and I do not wear it if I'm active. To be fair, this has not happened to my friend. I wrote the manufacturer to request a solution, but they have not responded.
customer_reviews.author: Jay VT

customer_reviews.title: COPPER PLATING ONLY
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE TO MY REVIEW. THE BRACELETS ARE NOW WELL WORN AND SCRATCHED. THERE IS NO COPPER UNDER THE SCRATCHES. IT IS JUST BLACK LINES WHERE THE COPPER COATING SCRATCHED OFF.
customer_reviews.author: gayle grant brown

customer_reviews.title: Nice bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I can't write about it's overall effectiveness as a pain reliever but it does look very nice as a bracelet. I wear it 24hrs a day and it has not tarnished even when wet. It is not cumbersome but fits my wrist rather well. It doesn't look like a copper color but more of a rose gold. It has small chips around the perimeter of the bracelet that are noticeable but doesn't detract from its value. It came with a notice that I could receive a 2nd bracelet for free by going to its website. That's a great bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It helped my arthritis, but bent out of shape quickly
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bracelet and kept it on most of the time. It worked very well to help the arthritis in my hands and thumbs. However, I did take it off once or twice a day. After only a few weeks, it became mis-shapen and did not look right. I tried to bend it back to its original shape, and I could not. I had another one that I bought at the same time, and it did not do this. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quick Healing!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very painful arthritic thumb joint from repetitive injuries. It has curtailed many of my activities that involved using my hand. I purchased this copper bracelet because I was tired of taking painkillers and cortisone shots. Within 2 HOURS, the pain was gone, gone, gone. I’ve had this bracelet for over a week now and I am still very much pain (and drug) free! I am a true believer! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Mark McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Rusty Spots on my arm from the magnets
customer_reviews.text: Rusty Spots on my arm from the magnets Bracelet seemed great at first, even noticed relief from the wrist pain. But now 3 weeks in my wife asked me if my wrist was green yet, so I slid the bracelet a bit and had 2 brown streaks on the bottom of my wrist. I removed the bracelet and noticed that all 6 of the magnets are dark brown and rusty What can be done about this ?
customer_reviews.author: Dcb5739

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for arthritis in wrist
customer_reviews.text: This bracelet has been good for helping with the pain in my wrist due to arthritis. I haven't noticed any pain releif anywhere else. It looks fashionable while wearing it. I like the magnets on it because they contantly stay against my skin keeping the bracelet in place.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Materia
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bracelet in June for The copper and what I read about copper and I feel that it did help me but I am so dispointed about how rusty is has turned in such a little time that I had it I am just not Satisfied at this point. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Lila a. Osby

customer_reviews.title: Magnets Fell Out
customer_reviews.text: So I was diagnosed with carpal tunnel and started a desk job recently. I have done everything I can to make my desk as ergonomic as possible. I found therapy bracelets online and decided to give this a try. Now I have noticed since I've worn it that the pain and tingling in my right hand has pretty much gone away almost completely. Which is amazing. So I do believe that these types of bracelets can make a difference. However I will be switching to a different type because this one has bent and a couple of the magnets have fallen out already. I have only had it for about a month and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Faria

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on this. It does nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Tin Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: I love this! It is extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It is extremely comfortable, and I have very small wrists. It is very light. I hardly know that I have it on. And it is very pretty! The color is burnished and looks much like a rose gold. I can wear this with casual clothes, but with more feminine dresses and such as well because it is very flattering. It is stylish and compliments my light skin tone. It would be lovely with darker skin tones as well. It is so pretty. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: marielle

customer_reviews.title: DISCRETE AND HELPFUL
customer_reviews.text: I NOTICE A DIFFERENCE IN HOW I FEEL HOWEVR3 AFTER WEARING IT FOR TWO WEEKS AND TAKING IT OFF I HAD A REALLY BAD PAIN IN MY ARM NOT SURE IF ITS RELATED BUT I DID NOTICE A DIFFERENCE IN HOW I FELT WEARING IT. LOOKS CUTE TOO. NO ONE KNEW WHAT IT WAS. THATS A PLUS.
customer_reviews.author: MARIA M.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: this was a very nice bracelet, however i had to return it because it was too big for my arm. It was so heavy duty it was not easy to make smaller or bigger. I was afraid if we made smaller I might not be able to get it back off. I did however love the style of this bracelet.
customer_reviews.author: patty

customer_reviews.title: These WORK!!
customer_reviews.text: They do work I have a little pain just below my right hand don’t know if its arthritis or what but this does the job took off one night to get in spa for got to put back on, got up next day only had my two bracelets on this one makes the three I wear the ((others not copper) I noticed my hand hurting looked no cop. Bracelet but it on,by night time no pain go figure! Guess it works for me!!😉
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS!?
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom for mother's day 2019. She has rheumatoid arthritis. Lately her wrist has been hurting more often. So far, she has been surprised that this bracelet ACTUALLY helped with the pain. Now I'M considering one for myself. I'm just waiting to see if it's a short term relief or good for long term. Only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: megafighter1983

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and if it works that will be great
customer_reviews.text: Actually like it as bracelet. If it works will be great. Friends in Alabama think they are great and really help. On fellow rides motorcycles and swears it fixed his tennis elbow in three weeks. I just hope to help my left index finger that has a problem about every two weeks for about and hour.
customer_reviews.author: JohnB

customer_reviews.title: I Am Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bracelet out of desperation. My carpal tunnel was so bad I couldn't use my thumbs because I couldn't feel them at all. I was taking curcumin and it relieved about 70% of my symptoms, but that wasn't enough. This bracelet has made a difference. I would say that my symptoms are about 80-85% better in total. I would recommend giving it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Copper bracelet
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I ordered and it was not anything like the original one I received. Either they shipped the wrong one or have changed it. It was larger and shiney. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Neely

customer_reviews.title: Durable and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I wore this bracelet every single day from 04/17 to 05/18. It never came off for any reason. It never turned my wrist green or caused any irritation. The bracelet did start to chip a little so I replaced it with another brand bracelet. After two weeks my wrist was green. I am going to purchase this again. BTW, it did not help at all with my RA but it looks really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: First off I like the design, second it actually did give me some relief so for the low price it’s not bad. My main complaint is I’ve noticed the inset magnets are rusting so the bad the rust rubs your skin making it very irritating to your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Steel414

customer_reviews.title: A LOT of people swear by this. And it's pretty.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my brother in Fla. who has many medical issues. He thanked me over the phone but I have no idea if he uses it or if it ever helped him. Like every gift I send there, it fell into a big black hole, never to be seen or mentioned again.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Smith

customer_reviews.title: Shiny bracelet
customer_reviews.text: This bracelet was not what I expected. I compared several similar bracelets and chose this one because I was expecting it to be a matte or “brushed” appearance as it shows in the photos but it is shiny just like all of the other bracelets that I did not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jymie T Ripka

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I really like my bracelet because it is not cheap looking like some other bracelets I have purchased. It looks really nice and I won’t mind wearing it everyday. The joints in my hands hurt almost every day and since i started wearing it my hands actually feel better. I received my bracelet on time as promised. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Reicosplay

customer_reviews.title: It works for me and my mon
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two and them ordered a third one to help with my arthritis. I'm not a doctor but it works for me, it helps my fingers from cramping up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not my style of bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping to try something different for arthritis relief. It looks nice but I don’t like the clamp type style for me. I quite wearing it after a couple of days because it was uncomfortable and annoying. If I try another copper bracelet it will be flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Pam S

customer_reviews.title: Dr's don't particularly like to see it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Mom who was having wrist problems with a nerve. She actually thinks it helped ease the pain. Dr's don't particularly like to see it, but if it works, then why not?! Mom eventually had surgery for a "nerve sleeve" and now it's fine! But she always knows she has the bracelet on days that her wrist seems to ache.
customer_reviews.author: FLGRILLER

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: At first product looked great. But it suffered wear and tear pretty quickly. It tarnished and looked very unattractive. I am not sure of its effects as wearing it would make no sense. Looking for something better.
customer_reviews.author: Indee

customer_reviews.title: Coppers easy to bend but this bracelet is not
customer_reviews.text: It is very hard to bend ... it’s like copper over some other metal... I have RA and had to have help getting it on and off... and it didn’t help the pain any...
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Tothill

customer_reviews.title: Arthritis
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my wife on the off chance that it MIGHT work. During the first week we noticed a little difference but into the second week we are seeing significant pain lessening. I am more than pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Fincher

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have fybromiagia along with arthritis and I've worn this now for a few months straight and no color change on my skin as long as it comes off while showering , working out. I have noticed a difference in my hands and wrists for sure
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer E.

customer_reviews.title: Healing copper and magnetic bracelet, better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of This copper bracelet with healing magnets. My husband has arthritis and carpel tunnel syndrome. He is wearing this till he gets in for surgery. Wished we gotten this well before as it has really eased his pain.
customer_reviews.author: amazon fan

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this bracelet and the weight. I have a small wrist and it was easy to squeeze it together to fit my wrist. I haven't worn it more than 24 hours so I'm not sure yet how well it does for arthritis. I will say I've only taken 1/2 pain pill today. I'll update my review after I've worn it a week or so.
customer_reviews.author: Ansley Monaghan

customer_reviews.title: Not really the color of copper
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good except I think the color is closer to rose gold then copper. I'm using it for arthritis relief......I'm not really a believer of copper and magnets but I'll give it a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Fair
customer_reviews.text: A little small for a mans wrist. It helps a little but not to the level they say it does. Used for arthritus in the hands.
customer_reviews.author: Allen L. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Giving it a try, why not!  Lot of ppl swear over copper.
customer_reviews.text: We love it. I remember lot of older ppl I worked with wore copper bracelets. They said they help. So my girlfriend and I got one. Easy to adjust to fit to your liking.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Surowiec

customer_reviews.title: You'll be pleasantly surprised how well this works. I was!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but have found relief from a nagging shoulder injury as a result of wearing this. My wife bought me one. After it was evident it would work well for me, I gave it to her to where to see if her recent shoulder pain would be helped. She received almost immediate relief so I purchased another bracelet for her.
customer_reviews.author: David L MacIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Happy That I tried this Product, It works!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with my results from the use of this bracelet. After receiving my new bracelet I immediately tried it and was happy to fell the effects of it within only a few days. My pain did not immediately go away completely but it has eased it bringing me welcome relief.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Not as good a bracelet as I'd hoped for something so simple in design
customer_reviews.text: copper works good for me but the bracelet doesn't retain its shape well with day to day use and one of the magnets fell out just a few months after I started using it. Would look for another brand or model next time around. For now it works ok.
customer_reviews.author: johnnyguitar335

customer_reviews.title: Magnets lost
customer_reviews.text: It was nice and shiny and I do believe it helps. I took it off this weekend only to find the magnets fell out. 😥 Now it's ineffective and probably why I've had pain lately.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F

customer_reviews.title: Helps pain but doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend has horrible arthritis in both his hands.......wakes up in tears from the pain. These bracelets work for the most part. We are aware the green residue is normal for copper but I am not happy with how the bracelet is rusting around the magnets and becoming so sharp they are unwearable. I bought two of these less than 2 weeks ago and they are now useless.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend that loves Cooper brackets .
customer_reviews.author: Aldo

customer_reviews.title: looks sharp and cool too. since I have it
customer_reviews.text: I always thought this was hokus pokus.... a friend said, try it, I did, and I have not taken it off, no more pain in my wrist. its a well made bracelet, looks sharp and cool too. since I have it, others I know have bought one and love it.
customer_reviews.author: StoweBum

customer_reviews.title: My ankle pain is better but it could be a combination of the copper ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for 5 days so I can't give it an honest rating yet. I have seen an improvement in my shoulder pain. My ankle pain is better but it could be a combination of the copper compression ankle brace along with the copper bracelet. I will try to do another review in a month.
customer_reviews.author: eddyabear

customer_reviews.title: I get pain from working out with heavy weight. ...
customer_reviews.text: I get pain from working out with heavy weight. It puts stress on my wrist. I tried on this bracelet and most of pain subsided aboyt 70 percent.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: The fit is not secure it moves around.
customer_reviews.text: Noticed a difference in the beginning but does not seem to be helping as well now. Color is fading.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: It really works.
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical when I bought it but it really made a difference for me, plan to buy another one for my other arm but the pain has almost disappeared.
customer_reviews.author: Firelei

customer_reviews.title: Arthritis
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical at first about this, but seeing as my mom, who has Arthritis, would constantly wake up crying because of the pain she was feeling at night, I thought I would buy this for her and give it a shot. It has definitely helped her so much! I’m glad I bought it she seems to really like it and has told me her pain has been reduced a lot and she hardly even feels any type of pain on her arms anymore. I would definitely recommend this item. I’m
customer_reviews.author: joannperales

customer_reviews.title: Bigger  Copper bracelets
customer_reviews.text: I brougt two braclet one for me and my partner. By the way , i have very small wrist, which is not a problem. My partner has bigger wrist, the item needed to be built with bigger people in mind. I waited for few months to review. My partner wrist was discolored,and one of his magnets fell out buy not having breathing space on his wrist it csuse mold. I will reorder it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Looks Like Copper!
customer_reviews.text: 99.9% copper coating my butt. The outside layer wore off after a few days and this bracelet is cheap silver metal underneath. The packaging looked beautiful, but the product is a cheap .25 cent crank machine bracelet. I feel as if someone just stole from me. I DO NOT recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: DRAPPER

customer_reviews.title: Everyday joint pain seems almost painless now with my copper bracelet!
customer_reviews.text: No defaults so far and hopefully pain keeps going away with daily wear.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Parker

customer_reviews.title: What a waste
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing for my arthritis or painful joints, what a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Russell E. Nail, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for the look. It did mention Good Luck, and I won 3 Bingos shortly after wearing bracelet for first time. Just sayin'
customer_reviews.author: Johnny The Boy

customer_reviews.title: Believe the Research
customer_reviews.text: A couple of my friends who strongly believe in copper bracelets (for pain relieve) talked me into trying one. For one who is very skeptic, being open minded I ordered this particular bracelet really hoping that it would relieve some pain. Wore it for a week with no results. It's a nice looking bracelet if your into wearing mens jewelry, which I'm not and that's why I'm returning it, plus as I said it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Ron T

customer_reviews.title: Help me a lot
customer_reviews.text: I have carpal Connell and when I sleep my hands go numb I noticed when I started wearing the bracelet the numbness is gone and I only get tingling in the tips of my fingers so I would say it helped a lot
customer_reviews.author: loida

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bracket with magnets!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom who has a arthritis. My family has always said copper braclets help with arthritis. It has magnets as well. It’s great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Goldstein Class Wish List

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try. Better than drugs
customer_reviews.text: Whether this has a placebo affect of not, it works for me. It’s not total pain relief, but it seems to take the edge off.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be helping the pain
customer_reviews.text: the first one I bought seems to be helping. I don't have to use near as much pain med. I bought another for my opposite wrist. Also got one for my nephew to help him out.
customer_reviews.author: hammerhead

customer_reviews.title: I REALLY love this bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY love this bracelet! I would not have believed how effective it could be unless experienced it. I would like to get one a little more decorative but not sacrifice its effectiveness. I don't want to look like odd wearing this style on both wrists but would love a style(s) where I could.
customer_reviews.author: paulip

customer_reviews.title: Braclet
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look and feel of the bracelet but it turned my wrist green so I bought another1
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Just not for me
customer_reviews.text: Didn't feel any difference, kind of hurt my wrist after a few days of wear (took off at night). Easy to adjust though. Gave it to mom to see if it'd help her.
customer_reviews.author: ME now

customer_reviews.title: Corrosion After Two Weeks
customer_reviews.text: Like the look. Comfortable to wear. But corrosion already present after only two weeks of wear. Disappointingly cheap product. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Big LAX Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't have any affect for pain, returned it.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't help at all with my pain on my dominant hand.
customer_reviews.author: Briton13

customer_reviews.title: Seems to do good
customer_reviews.text: My husband had me order this for him because hes having problems with either carpal tunnel or arthritis..dont know which..but I figures its worth a shot. Within a few hours he said that his thumb and wrist were still a little sore..but nothing like the pain he had before. As he continues to wear it I hope for improvement..but he really likes it
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Downin

customer_reviews.title: Flexible and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Easy to make this copper the right size. Good looking & plain. Hoping it helps my chemo related neuropathy pain.
customer_reviews.author: Bette D. Young

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, all the help I can find
customer_reviews.text: I rate my Copper Bracelet a 5 out of 5! This bracelet is very very comfortable and adds a nice fashion element. But most of all I am noticing some relief. I am during more each day to ease the issues I will have with arthritis. Thank you for this product, best purchase I have made in a while. I looking to possibly add a ring as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plain Copper Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought two bracelets - one for each wrist to help with arthritis. He really likes this one, but loves the twisted copper one.
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty
customer_reviews.text: I haven't noticed a huge amount of lesser pain but it's definitely really pretty. I get plenty of compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Vestica Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Customer service
customer_reviews.text: Had a small issue ... one of the 6 tiny magnets fell out. I emailed to get a replacement magnet that I would have epoxy'd in. They replaced the bracelet immediately and followed up as well.
customer_reviews.author: Roger D.
